content: simple but oh so attractive this over-sized scarf is just what you need to update last year s wardrobe ours is 90 long in a neutral heather but you can make your super scarf any length and any color you desire this is an easy crochet in a variation of the basic ripple stitch gauge 24 sts 2 ripples = 7 18 cm 5 row = 4 10cm check your gauge also as speckled super scarf 1 and wavy ridge 2 1 http //www redheart com/free-patterns/speckled-super-scarf 2 https //www yarnspirations com/red-heart-wavy-ridge-super-scarf/rhc0125-016921m html#q=wavy+ridge&includecontent=true&start=2
